name: CRITICAL STRIKE: Fierce Battle
description:
CRITICAL STRIKE: Fierce Battle Shooter!!!
First person shooting fps missions include lot's of world war scenarios & actopm fps free games military tasks. It's call of military warfare where you are facing infinite warfare against your enemies. Win the medal of destruction & face enemies special forces in the front war. Use best warfare weapons, sniper, rifles and military hero equipment.
Features:
- Smart AI
- Smooth control
- Excellent graphics
- Advanced sniper rifle
- amazing sound effects
- realistic shooting effect
- first person shooter game
